author: cnbc.com
title: Packaging & Containers Stocks' Research Reports Released on Ball, Bemis, Berry Global, and Crown
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on BLL, BMS, BERY, and CCK which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Ahead of today's trading session, WallStEquities.com observes the performance of the following equities: Ball Corp. (NYSE: BLL), Bemis Co. Inc. (NYSE: BMS), Berry Global Group Inc. (NYSE: BERY), and Crown Holdings Inc. (NYSE: CCK). These stocks belong to the Packaging and Containers industry, which consists of companies engaged in the manufacturing of containers, as well as companies offering packaging services. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below. www.wallstequities.com/registration
Ball
Last Friday, shares in Broomfield, Colorado headquartered Ball Corp. ended the session 2.32% lower at $37.46. The stock recorded a trading volume of 1.85 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 2.18% over the past year. The stock is trading 3.50% below its 50-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Ball Corp., which supplies metal packaging products to the beverage, food, personal care, and household industries, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 41.09.
On January 17 th , 2018, research firm Citigroup upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Neutral' to 'Buy'.
On January 24 th , 2018, Ball Corp.'s board of directors declared a cash dividend of 10 cents per share, payable on March 15 th , 2018, to shareholders of record as of March 01 st , 2018. Separately, the Company announced that it will report Q4 2017 earnings on February 07 th , 2018, before trading begins on the NYSE, followed by a conference call at 11:00 a.m. ET. Get the full research report on BLL for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=BLL
Bemis
Neenah, Wisconsin-based Bemis Co. Inc.'s stock declined slightly by 0.54%, to close the day at $45.96 with a total trading volume of 565,904 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 1.59% over the previous three months. The stock is trading 0.65% above its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Bemis, which manufactures and sells packaging products, have an RSI of 37.55.
On February 01 st , 2018, Bemis reported cash from operations for its fourth quarter ended December 31 st , 2017 of $79.5 million, and earnings per share of $(0.44). Cash flow from operations for the twelve months ended December 31 st , 2017 was $379.0 million. In addition, capital expenditures totaled $188.5 million for the twelve months ended December 31 st , 2017. Gain free access to the research report on BMS at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=BMS
Berry Global Group
Shares in Evansville, Indiana headquartered Berry Global Group Inc. recorded a trading volume of 1.11 million shares at the close of the last trading session, which was above their three months average volume of 853,260 shares. The stock ended the day 0.75% lower at $58.50. The Company's shares have advanced 14.21% over the past year. The stock is trading above its 200-day moving average by 1.48%. Furthermore, shares of Berry Global, which manufactures and distributes engineered materials, nonwoven specialty materials, and consumer packaging products, have an RSI of 42.18.
On January 24 th , 2018, Berry Global announced that it will report its Q1 FY18 results on February 07 th , 2018, before trading begins on the NYSE. At 10:00 a.m. ET that same day, the Company will hold its quarterly conference call. A live webcast of the conference call and a supplemental presentation can be accessed under the investor relations section of the Company's website. Signing up today on Wall St. Equities will give you access to the latest report on BERY at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=BERY
Crown Holdings
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania headquartered Crown Holdings Inc.'s shares finished Friday's session 2.44% lower at $56.88. A total volume of 788,267 shares was traded. The stock has advanced 5.20% over the past year. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 1.77%. Furthermore, shares of Crown, which designs, manufactures, and sells packaging products for consumer goods in the Americas, Europe, and Asia/Pacific, have an RSI of 41.42.
On January 18 th , 2018, Crown Holdings (CCK) announced that it has priced its offerings of €500 million principal amount of 2.875% senior unsecured notes due 2026 and €335 million principal amount of 2.250% senior unsecured notes due 2023 issued at par by its subsidiary Crown European Holdings S.A., and its offering of $875 million principal amount of 4.750% senior unsecured notes due 2026 issued at par by Crown Americas LLC and Crown Americas Capital Corp. VI, each a subsidiary of CCK. Register now for today's free coverage on CCK at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CCK
Wall St. Equities :
Wall St. Equities (WSE) produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. WSE has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps. Such sponsored content is outside the scope of procedures detailed below.
WSE has not been compensated; directly or indirectly; for producing or publishing this document.
